article_title: Israel, Hezbollah trade strikes over Lebanon border
sentence: Hezbollah  has  fired  a  barrage  of  rockets  into  northern  Israel,  killing  one  person,  in  response  to  deadly  Israeli  strikes  on  a  Lebanese  village.

article_title: Israel, Hezbollah trade strikes over Lebanon border
sentence: He  had  severe  wounds  and  was  pronounced  dead  at  the  scene,  it  added.
